title: Where can I send detailed screenshots of toxicity?
body: I have encountered a player who I will not name here, however he was extremely toxic calling me an n word and other slurs in game. I have a screenshot of him calling me the n word outside of game and I would like to send it to support and have him punished. Any help will be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
You're more than welcome to send those screenshots over to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can take a look for you. I can't promise any action would be taken, but it's always good to reach out and try! 

Keep in mind that you can always block someone who is harassing you outside of the game, and if someone is toxic in-game you can use the report feature in the post game lobby.
Thank you I have already blocked him and reported but I was just wondering if there was another report feature that might make action faster. Thank you again.
